renderpass.code:
#define rot(a) mat2(cos(a+vec4(0,33,11,0)))                       // rotation
#define E(q)   length( vec2( length(q.xy/vec2(1.5,1) ) - 1., q.z )) // ellipse
// variant:
//#define E(q)   length( vec2( length((q.xy-vec2(0,.7))/vec2(1.5,1) ) - 1., q.z )) // ellipse

void mainImage( out vec4 O, vec2 u ) {

    vec3 R = iResolution,
         P = 5./R, q,
         D = normalize(vec3( u , -R.y ) - .5*R ),
         M = iMouse.z > 0. ? iMouse.xyz/R -.5 :                   // comment for no mouse cam
                 vec3( .15,.07,0) * cos(.3*iTime + vec3(0,11,0));          
    float t=1., i;
    
    for ( O=vec4(1); O.x > 0. && t > .01; O-=.01 )                // --- march scene
        q = P, 
        q.yz *= rot(-6.*M.y),                                     // rotations
        q.xz *= rot(-6.*M.x-1.57),
        t = min( min( E(q) ,                                      // SDF
                      E(q.yzx) ),
                      E(q.zxy)
               ) -.1,
        P += t*D;                                                 // step
    
    O *= O*O ;                                                    // color scheme
}
renderpass.name: Image
